# init(language:revision:)

**Initializer**

Creates model parameters.

## Declaration

```swift
init(language: NLLanguage? = nil, revision: Int = 1)
```

## Parameters

- **language**: The language of the text in the word embedding.
- **revision**: The revision of the word embedding.
title: init(language:revision:)
